§ 803. Commissioned officers of the Army, Air Force, or Space Force: forfeiture of pay when dropped from rolls A commissioned officer of the Army, the Air Force, or the Space Force who is dropped from the rolls under section 1161(b) of title 10 for absence without authority for three months forfeits all pay due or to become due. (Pub. L. 87–649, Sept. 7, 1962, 76 Stat. 486; Pub. L. 116–283, div. A, title IX, § 925(i)(2)(A), (B), Jan. 1, 2021, 134 Stat. 3828.)
